content: sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and making up for the body sew side edges decrease mouse grey yarn start at the bottom end stuffing as you sew and gather cast on sts decrease at bottom end note the seam runs down underside row 1 to 2 starting on a rs knit row work 2 row sew on two 6mm buttons for for eyes sew over in st st the end of the nose in palest pink yarn a few times row 3 rs kfb 8 times k1 17 sts in vertical stitches and hide yarn ends inside the row 4 purl body for each ear sew the side edges onto top of head behind the eyes for the tail sew one end row 5 k1 kfb 8 times k1 25 sts onto the back end of the body weave in all other row 6 to 16 starting on a ws purl row work 11 yarn tails inside the body row in st st row 17 k5 k2tog k2 4 times k4 21 sts oak leaves row 18 to 20 starting on a ws purl row work 3 row in st st row 21 k5 k2tog k1 4 times k4 17 sts oak leaf row 22 to 24 starting on a ws purl row work 3 ⇨ note the other leaves are knit row in st st in dark red chocolate brown and gingerbread brown instead of orange row 25 k1 k2tog k1 5 times k1 12 sts make 1 per leaf cast on 2 sts using 3 25mm single row 26 purl pointed needles and orange yarn start at the top row 27 k2tog 6 times 6 sts tip of the leaf pull through to cast off row 1 rs kfb sl1 wyif 3 sts row 2 kfb 2 times sl1 wyif 5 sts mouse ears row 3 k4 sl1 wyif make 2 per mouse using the long tail cast on for a row 4 k1 kfb 2 times k1 sl1 wyif 7 sts stretchy edge cast on 12 sts using 3 25mm single row 5 k6 sl1 wyif pointed needles in mouse grey yarn start at the outer edge row 6 k2 kfb 2 times k2 sl1 wyif 9 sts autumn warmth wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 12 of 19 row 7 cast off 2 sts k5 sl1 wyif 7 sts owl wings row 8 cast off 2 sts kfb 2 times k1 sl1 wyif follow the blackbird wings patt in mouse grey 7 sts row 9 cast on 3 sts cast off 3 sts k5 sl1 wyif owl eyes 7 sts make 2 per owl using the long tail cast on for a row 10 cast on 3 sts cast off 3 sts k1 kfb 2 stretchy edge cast on 12 using using 3 25mm times k2 sl1 wyif 9 sts single pointed needles and pale cream yarn start row 11 to 18 repeat row 7 to 10 twice more 9 sts at the
